prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that can hide in its shell and has a long tongue.
Show me a Pokemon with a purple shell and a black base, perfect for underwater battles.
Design a small aquatic creature that has a playful personality and loves to surf.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique clam shape, known for its defensive skills in battles.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in coastal areas and has a distinctive purple hue.
Make a character inspired by a mollusk, with vibrant colors and a tough exterior.
Give me a Pokemon that has a tongue sticking out, showcasing its playful nature.
